# EasyS order manager API

## Compatibility

### Django 3.2

Python 3.8 to 3.10
DRF 3.11 to 3.15

### Django 4.0

Python 3.8 to 3.10
DRF 3.13 to 3.15

### Django 4.1

Python 3.8 to 3.11
DRF 3.14 to 3.15

### Django 4.2

Python 3.8 to 3.12
DRF 3.14 to 3.15

### Django 5.0

Python 3.10 to 3.12
DRF 3.14 to 3.15

### Django 5.1

Python 3.10 to 3.12
DRF 3.14 to 3.15
